Sequence Information.Source: Phyllomedusa azurea (Orange-legged monkey frog) (Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis azurea)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ATCC 11775 (MIC=7.2 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600 (MIC=3.6 µM), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 49732 (MIC=1.8 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity but does not inhibit the growth of the fungus C. albicans.

Literature.Title: A combined mass spectrometric and cDNA sequencing approach to the isolation and characterization of novel antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis azurea.
Literature.Author: Thompson AH, Bjourson AJ, Orr DF, Shaw C, McClean S.

Literature.Title: Isolation and biochemical characterization of peptides presenting antimicrobial activity from the skin of Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis.
Literature.Author: Conceição K, Konno K, Richardson M, Antoniazzi MM, Jared C, Daffre S, Camargo AC, Pimenta DC.
